item.description:
This is a joint posting with the East of the River Dining Meetup group. Go to dinner and a movie, or just dinner or just the movie!

This meetup event is for those that don't celebrate Christmas, or find themselves with that evening free and would like to get out of the house for a few hours. Join us for dinner at the Royal Buffet in Manchester, and then if you'd like we can check out a movie afterwards.

The buffet has everything to offer, from American, Italian, Chinese, steak, seafood, barbecue, seafood, and more.

For more information:

http://www.restaurant...

Afterwards, we'll be going to Sherlock Holmes which is opening that day. The movie time is 7:40 so please be there no later than 7:25. The movie theater is Showcase Buckland Hills.

Of course, you don't have to attend both events: join us just for dinner, or just for the movie. Just let me know which event you're going to attend.
item.how_to_find_us: Meet by the front door - Lynne looks like her picture and she'll place a "Meetup" Sign on the table
item.name: Dinner and a Movie: Christmas Day
